entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 09:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
